text: Kintu tamra sampradayera madhyera yara abisbasa karechila tadera pradhanara balale -- ''amara to tomake amadera mato ekajana manusa ba'i dekhachi na, ara amara tomake dekhachi na ye tomake tara chara emana an'ya ke'u anusarana karache yara hacche prathama drstite'i amadera madhye adhama, ara amara tomadera madhye amadera ca'ite kono gunapana'o dekhachi na, baram amara tomadera mane kari mithyabadi.’’
